# The `ExtractElementInst` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This instruction extracts a single (scalar) element from a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vectortype">VectorType</a> value. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::ExtractElementInst</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This instruction extracts a single (scalar) element from a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vectortype">VectorType</a> value.
